amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 119-445 to reduce the District of Columbia District and Appeals Court funding by 20% and to strike the salary and expense funding for Judges Boasberg and Boardman's staff.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the District of Columbia District and Appeals Court funding by 20% and to strike the salary and expense funding for Judges Boasberg's and Judge Boardman's staffs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 257, 1 Present (Roll no. 26).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 257, 1 Present (Roll no. 26).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
